basics.name: Voraton Lertrattanapaisal
basics.label: Staff Software Engineer
basics.summary: Staff Software Engineer at LINE MAN Wongnai with a focus on architecting scalable web applications. Experienced in leading development teams, managing complex projects, and mentoring junior developers. Passionate about creating efficient, scalable solutions and driving successful product development.

work.name: LINE MAN Wongnai
work.summary: Leading software engineering initiatives at Thailand's leading food delivery and restaurant discovery platform. Architecting scalable web applications and managing cross-functional development teams.
highlights: Leads multiple projects by convening teams to examine requirements, break them down into tasks, and assign efficiently
Provides quick assistance and viable solutions when problems arise, offering both short and long-term remedies
Mentors and coaches interns and junior developers, successfully training them as a senior developer
Handles hiring processes flawlessly, resulting in the addition of high-quality Frontend developers to the team
Motivates coworkers to develop successful products and features
Digs deep into situations to find root causes of issues and offers informed decision-making support

volunteer.summary: Organize monthly meetups for local developers to share knowledge and network.
highlights: Invited speakers from major tech companies

awards.title: JASSO Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded for academic excellence and participation in Japanese business innovation program.

certificates.name: The Certificate of Completion "THE COMPREHENSIVE COURSE IN JAPANESE BUSINESS INNOVATION"

publications.name: Building Scalable Web Applications
publications.summary: An article discussing best practices for building scalable web applications.
